00261 inline bool CLine2d::operator == (const CLine2d& line) const
00262 {
00263        return ((m_point1 == line.m_point1) && (m_point2 == line.m_point2));
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 inline bool CLine2d::operator != (const CLine2d& line) const
00268 {
00269        return !operator == (line);
00270 }

00272 
00273 inline bool CLine2d::IsNull() const
00274 {
00275        return (m_point1 == m_point2);
00276 }

00279 inline CVector2d CLine2d::GetDiffVector() const
00280 {
00281        return m_point2 - m_point1;

00309 inline double CLine2d::GetCutXPos(double linePosY) const
00310 {
00311        CVector2d diff = GetDiffVector();
00312 
00313        return (linePosY - m_point1.GetY()) * diff.GetX() / diff.GetY() + m_point1.GetX();
00314 }
00315 
00316 
00317 
00318 inline double CLine2d::GetCutYPos(double linePosX) const
00319 {
00320        CVector2d diff = GetDiffVector();
00321 
00322        return (linePosX - m_point1.GetX()) * diff.GetY() / diff.GetX() + m_point1.GetY();
00323 }
00324 
00325 
00326 inline double CLine2d::GetCutAlpha(const CLine2d& line) const
00327 {
00328        const i2d::CVector2d& delta = GetDiffVector();
00329        const i2d::CVector2d& lineDelta = line.GetDiffVector();
00330        const i2d::CVector2d& beginPoint = GetPoint1();
00331        const i2d::CVector2d& lineBeginPoint = line.GetPoint1();
00332 
00333        double crossProductZ = lineDelta.GetCrossProductZ(delta);
00334 
00335        return (beginPoint.GetCrossProductZ(delta) + delta.GetCrossProductZ(lineBeginPoint)) / crossProductZ;
00336 }
00337 
00338 
00339 inline double CLine2d::GetCastAlpha(const i2d::CVector2d& point) const
00340 {
00341        i2d::CVector2d delta = GetDiffVector();
00342        i2d::CVector2d deltaToPoint = point - m_point1;
00343 
00344        double dotProduct = delta.GetDotProduct(deltaToPoint);
00345        return dotProduct / delta.GetLength2();
00346 }
00347 
00348 
00349 inline bool CLine2d::CutDisk(const i2d::CVector2d& center, double radius) const
00350 {
00351        const i2d::CVector2d& delta = GetDiffVector();
00352        const i2d::CVector2d& deltaToCenter = m_point1 - center;
00353 
00354        double a = delta.GetLength2();
00355        if (a < I_BIG_EPSILON * I_BIG_EPSILON){
00356               return (m_point1.GetDistance2(center) <= radius * radius);
00357        }
00358        double b = delta.GetDotProduct(deltaToCenter);
00359        double c = deltaToCenter.GetLength2() - radius * radius;
00360 
00361        double D = b * b - a * c;
00362        if (D >= 0){
00363               double sqrtD = ::sqrt(D);
00364 
00365               double alpha1 = (-b - sqrtD) / a;
00366               double alpha2 = (-b + sqrtD) / a;
00367               if ((alpha1 < 1) && (alpha2 > 0)){
00368                      return true;
00369               }
00370        }
00371        return false;
00372 }
00373 
00374 
00375 inline QPair<double, double> CLine2d::GetAlphaAndCastDistance(const i2d::CVector2d& point) const
00376 {
00377        i2d::CVector2d delta = m_point2 - m_point1;
00378        i2d::CVector2d deltaToPoint = point - m_point1;
00379 
00380        double dotProduct = delta.GetDotProduct(deltaToPoint);
00381        double field = delta.GetCrossProductZ(deltaToPoint);
00382        double deltaLength2 = delta.GetLength2();
00383 
00384        return QPair<double, double>(dotProduct / deltaLength2, field / ::sqrt(deltaLength2));
00385 }
